    Block​(Words word, boolean controllable)
    Constructor of a Block : need a word (Words) and a boolean controllable to know the image associated.

      public Block secondNoun

      public java.util.ArrayList<Words> properties

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block​(Words word, boolean controllable)
      Constructor of a Block : need a word (Words) and a boolean controllable to know the image associated.
      Parameters:
      word - Words
      controllable - boolean true if he can move, else false

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Block create​(char token)
      Create a block by the character token given in the parameter. If isToken(token) not exist, an Exception is throw If the new block with the word associated to token is a NOUN and the token is a lower case, the word is controllable, else not.
      Parameters:
      token - char
      Returns:
      new Block with the word associated to the token and the boolean for the controllable.

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics2D, int x, int y)
      Draw all the objects in the block at the given position (x,y).
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - Instance of Graphics2D object used to draw shapes on the screen.
      x - integer for the coordinate x
      y - integer for the coordinate y

    • updateSecondNounProp

      public void updateSecondNounProp​(java.util.List<Rule> rules)
      Update the properties of the second object in the block at the position of the object at each movement of them.
      Parameters:
      rules - List with all the rules in the map

    • updateProperties

      public void updateProperties​(java.util.List<Rule> rules)
      Take the word in first of rules, select each third word of first in rules and add it to the list of properties of first.
      Parameters:
      rules - List with all the rules in the map

    • hasProperty

      public boolean hasProperty​(Words property)
      Check if the property exist in the properties of the block where we are
      Parameters:
      property - Words
      Returns:
      true if the property given in argument exist in the list properties, else false

    • isName

      public boolean isName​(java.lang.String name)
      Take the word in the block where we are and check if the name is equal to his name
      Parameters:
      name - String
      Returns:
      true if the name given in argument is the same, else false

    • isType

      public boolean isType​(WordTypes type)
      Check if the type of the block where we are is the same to the argument type
      Parameters:
      type - of the Word (NOUNS, OPERATOR, PROPERTY, BLANK)
      Returns:
      true if the type given in argument is the same, else false

    • isControllable

      public boolean isControllable()
      Returns:
      true if the Noun in the block can move or not, else false
